text:
@realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom ASK: is this the plan? 

ACT UP: Now

I allege we are moving to herd immunity outcomes by default with absence of a national testing and contact tracing capacity and program.

If so the human cost is estimated at 500,000 fatalities and unmeasurable pain.

https://t.co/ZwkZKxNPD1
